hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #3 Deku Scrubs#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Did you know that ReDead eat their defeated friends?

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #5# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #grave with a free chest#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #0# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found at #Zora's River#.

HC (Malon).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS Like Like Cage

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Ganon's Tower#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Right Bottom Fake Wall Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path of #time#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Forest Temple Boss Key# can be found in #the Market#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Requiem of Spirit#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #the Song of Storms#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #0# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Requiem of Spirit#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Freestanding Key

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #the Tower#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a lone #scrub in Death Mountain Crater# sells #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Epona's Song#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: Hi @, we've been trying to reach you about your horse's extended warranty.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Fire Temple Boss Key# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Top

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Epona's Song#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.
